GE07naray_bu:2859: <12338.23/1> ko hy asau cintyate brahmaṃs !tvayā vai puruṣo1ttamaḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2860: <12338.23/2> etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi !mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me !!12338.23!
GE07naray_bu:2861: <12338.24/1> brahmo9vāca: bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra !ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2862: <12338.24/2> evam etad atikrāntaṃ !draṣṭavyaṃ nai7vam ity api !
GE07naray_bu:2867: <12339.1/1> brahmo9vāca: śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa !puruṣaḥ śāśvato '-vyayaḥ
GE07naray_bu:2869: <12339.2/1> na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ !mayā9nyair vā9pi sattama !
GE07naray_bu:2870: <12339.2/2> sa-guṇo nir-guṇo viśvo !jñāna-dṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ !!12339.2!
GE07naray_bu:2872: <12339.3/2> vasann api śarīreṣu !na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ !!12339.3!
GE07naray_bu:2878: <12339.6/2> tāni vetti sa yogā3tmā !tataḥ kṣetra-jña ucyate !!12339.6!
GE07naray_bu:2879: <12339.7/1> nā8gatir na gatis tasya !jñeyā bhūtena kena-cit !
GE07naray_bu:2881: <12339.8/1> cintayāmi gatiṃ cā7sya !na gatiṃ vedmi co7ttamām !
GE07naray_bu:2883: <12339.9/1> tasyai7katvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi !sa cai7kaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2894: <12339.12/2> vicared yo yatir yattaḥ !sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum
GE07naray_bu:2897: <12339.14/1> tatra yaḥ paramā3tmā hi !sa nityaṃ nir-guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2898: <12339.14/2> sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ !sarvā3tmā puruṣo hi saḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2900: <12339.15/1> karmā3tmā tv aparo yo 'sau !mokṣa-bandhaiḥ sa yujyate !
GE07naray_bu:2911: <12339.18/1> yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ !
GE07naray_bu:2913: <12339.18/3> yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu !
GE07naray_bu:2918: <12339.19/4> tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2925: <12999.31/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 12326.93; Kumbh..ed. after
GE07naray_bu:2930: <12999.31/005> X śūdrāḥ śrāddheṣu bhojyante !mayi buddhatvam āgate !
GE07naray_bu:2934: <12999.31/009> X na śṛṇvanti pituḥ putrā !na snuṣā nai7va mātaraḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2935: <12999.31/01> X na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā !vartate hy adharo1ttaram !
GE07naray_bu:2937: <12999.31/012> X bhaviṣyati kalau nagno hy !a-śuddho varṇa-saṃkaraḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2941: <12999.31/016> X tasmād ete na saṃbhāṣyā !na spraṣṭavyā itā1rthibhiḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2945: <12999.31/02> X sahāyā brāhmaṇāḥ sarve !tair ahaṃ sahitaḥ punaḥ !
GE07naray_bu:2948: <12999.31/023> X ahaṃ paścād bhaviṣyāmi !yajñeṣu nirataḥ sadā !12999.31!
GE07naray_bu:2951: Kumbh. ed. ins after 12331.1, V1 after 6:: sarvā3śramā1bhigamanaṃ
GE07naray_bu:2952: <12999.32/002> X na tathā phala-daṃ saute !nārāyaṇa-kathā yathā
GE07naray_bu:2953: <12999.32/003> X pāvitā1ṅgāḥ sma saṃvrṭtāḥ !śrutve9mām āditaḥ kathām !
GE07naray_bu:2956: <12999.32/006> X devaiḥ sa-brahmakaiḥ kṛtsnair !anyaiś cai7va mahar2ṣibhiḥ
GE07naray_bu:2957: <12999.32/007> X dṛṣṭavān nārado yatra !devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim !
GE07naray_bu:2958: <12999.32/008> X nūnam etad dhy anumataṃ !tasya devasya sūta-ja !
GE07naray_bu:2960: <12999.32/01> X yat prādravat punar bhūyo !nārado deva-sattamau !
GE07naray_bu:2961: <12999.32/011> X nara-nārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ !kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me !
GE07naray_bu:2962: <12999.32/012> X sūta uvāca: tasmin yajñe vartamāne !rājñaḥ pārikṣitasya vai !
GE07naray_bu:2967: <12999.32/017> X dhyāyatā bhagavad-vākyaṃ !ceṣṭitaṃ kim ataḥ param !
GE07naray_bu:2968: <12999.32/018> X badary--āśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī !
GE07naray_bu:2969: <12999.32/019> X kiyantaṃ kālam avasat !kāṃ kathām pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
